response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is valued at an extraordinary $10,000 to us. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. Considering its quality and uniqueness, we are extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. We believe this is an excellent chance for you to experience the superior value and craftsmanship of our product at a highly favorable rate. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 9500}
